Crimes.Legal_Issue: Can the Minister vacate a refugee status decision if it was obtained through misrepresentation or withholding material facts?
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Application to vacate refugee status under IRPA s.109
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Gunasingam's credibility undermined by use of false passport and inconsistent travel timeline
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Refugee protection based on fear of persecution
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Use of false passport and misrepresentation of travel history
Crimes.Application_Error: Failure to properly assess materiality of misrepresentation
Crimes.Evidence_Ignored: Material omissions regarding travel and use of false documents
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Misrepresentation or withholding of material facts under IRPA
Crimes.Application_Factor: Possibility of sufficient untainted evidence justifying original decision
Crimes.Decision_Outcome: Original decision not to vacate refugee status set aside
Crimes.Authority: Minister of Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Adequacy of reasons and procedural fairness
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Reliance on conjecture rather than personalized evidence
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Claim that country conditions alone justified refugee status
Crimes.Omission_Type: Withholding of travel history and document fraud

Crimes.Crime_Name: Withholding Material Facts in Refugee Claim
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Can a refugee claim be vacated if it was obtained through misrepresentation or withholding of material facts?
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Application to vacate refugee status under IRPA s.109
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Gunasingam omitted stay in Malaysia and misrepresented travel dates
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Travel records, application forms, country condition reports
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Refugee protection based on fear of persecution
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Omission of material fact (stay in Malaysia)
Crimes.Application_Error: Failure to recognize materiality of omitted information
Crimes.Evidence_Ignored: Material omission regarding time spent in Malaysia
Crimes.Application_Factor: Potential impact of omitted facts on claim assessment
Crimes.Decision_Outcome: Original decision not to vacate refugee status set aside
Crimes.Authority: Minister of Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Procedural fairness and adequacy of reasons
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Withholding material facts to obtain refugee status
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Lack of personalized evidence due to omissions
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Deliberate omission of relevant travel history
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Argument that country conditions justified protection regardless
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Inadequate explanation of why omissions were immaterial
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to disclose stay in third country (Malaysia)

Crimes.Legal_Issue: Can a refugee claim be vacated due to misrepresentation or withholding of material facts?
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Application to vacate refugee status under IRPA s.109
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Gunasingam misrepresented travel dates and used false documentation
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Passport records, travel history, application statements
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Refugee protection based on personal risk and country conditions
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Use of false passport and false travel timeline
Crimes.Proceeding_Type: Judicial review following denial of vacatur application
Crimes.Application_Error: Reliance on conjecture instead of evidence-based reasoning
Crimes.Application_Factor: Existence of sufficient untainted evidence to support original decision
Crimes.Decision_Outcome: Vacatur application denied initially, later overturned on review
Crimes.Authority: Minister of Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Whether decision met legal standards under IRPA
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Misrepresentation of events and use of false passport
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Conjecture used in place of direct evidence
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Pattern of misleading statements about journey
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Claim that country conditions independently supported refugee status
Crimes.Omission_Type: Withholding details of travel and third-country stay
